title: Capitalism 2 [ganja00]
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Capitalism II Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: PC Game
File Size............: 299 MB
Image Format.........: .iso
Official Site........: http://www.enlight.com/capitalism2/

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Capitalism II Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Create and control
This in-depth strategy game covers almost every aspect of businessthat could be
encountered in the real world.

Become a Corporate CEO
Put your skills to use. Employ tactics from marketing manufacturing, purchasing
importing, retailing, and more just like a CEO and experience how your decision
will affect your empire. Capitalism II features two new campaigns, The
Capitalist Campaign and the Entrepreneur Campaign ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ plus an in-depth tutorial
to make the most complex business strategy a breeze to learn. This is the most comprehensive business simulation available.


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

To install the game follow this step:
1. Mount the .iso image onto a virtual drive
or
You could burn the .iso image onto a CD
2. Install the game
3. Have fun


To play game without CD or mounting the .iso image, replace cap2.exe (3.15 MB)
with the cap2.exe (2.20 MB) in C:/Program Files/Enlight/Capitalism 2

Please seed when done, thank you.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
System Requirements
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Operating System.....: Windows 98/Me/2000/XP/Vista
Processor............: Pentium II 223 MHz (Pentium II 350 MHz recommended)
RAM..................: 64 MB RAM (128 MB recommended)
Hard Drive Space.....: 250 MB Free HD Disk Space
Video Card...........: DirectX 8-compatible video card
Sound Card...........: 16-Bit DirectX compliant sound card

Please seed when done. Thank you.
ganja00
